title: (4240) A Brand New 2 Storied House for Sale, Pelawatha, Battaramulla
details: A Brand New 2 Storied House for Sale, Pelawatha Close to OSC int. School, all Super Markets & Banks, Large Garden on 24.5 Perches. Parking for more than 4 Vehicles, 4 Bedrooms With A/C, Modern Pantry and Curry Kitchen. Domestic & Drivers Quarters, Modern Toilets, Swimming Pool Wood floors. Rs : 950 (Negotiable) 95 Million
